sentence.Network_en: Sidewinder, an air - to - air missile bearing the name of a rattlesnake, is launched from a fighter plane.
sentence.Network_cn: “响尾蛇式”导弹是一种取名为响尾蛇的空对空导弹, 它从战斗机上发射.

sentence.Network_en: Future UAVs will carry other weapons, such as air - to - air or anti - radar missiles.
sentence.Network_cn: 未来的无人机将装载其它武器, 如空对空导弹或 反 雷达导弹.

sentence.Network_en: Additionally there are ground - to - air , ground - to - ground, air - to - ground and air - to - air missiles, etc.
sentence.Network_cn: 另外,还有 地对空 导弹、 地对地 导弹 、 空对地导弹 、 空对空导弹等.

list.abs: people and animals need clean air to breathe .人和动物都需要清洁的空气来呼吸。

efficient , ultra-high efficiency filter installed in the slip roads that are used to remove small solid particles and oil particles in order to obtain a very clean air to protect critical components .高效、超高效过滤器安装在支路中，用于去除极小的固体颗粒及油粒，以获得非常洁净的空气以保护重要的元件。

but , when exposed to air , fabricated aluminum ( sheets , wire , etc . ) tends to form a hard insulating oxide layer that stops the oxidizing process .但是，如果暴露在空气中，成品的铝（铝片，铝线等)会在表面形成坚固的绝缘的氧化膜，这样会阻止进一步的氧化。

but , when exposed to air , fabricated aluminum ( sheets , wire , etc . ) tends to form a hard insulating oxide layer that stops the oxidizing process .但是，如果暴露在空气中，成品的铝（铝片，铝线等)会在表面形成坚固的绝缘的氧化膜，这样会阻止进一步的氧化。

entry.tran: （战役）空对空的，空中飞机对空中飞机的
entry.def: Air-to-air combat is a battle between military aeroplanes where rockets or bullets are fired at one aeroplane from another.

means.word_mean: 1. operating between or launched from or involving rockets or aircraft in flight;
